answers.answer: Hi Debbie I too am having my baby tomorrow  at 9:30am (schedule c-section).  I'm worried I'm going to be up alnight worrying!!  I keep making lists and adding things on and checking and rechecking my suitcase and baby bag to make sure I have everything.  I don't know about you but for some reason I feel really nervous!Anyways all the best to you and your family tomorrow!Take CareDawn

Good luck to you guys tomorrow!!Debbie,I also have GD and control it with diet and my baby is measuring at 35th percentile.  If you keep your blood sugar under control I don't think baby will get too big.  I do hope that everything goes well for you and your boy tomorrow!
Good luck Debbie! Im sure it will be fine :) Cant wait for an update and see pics :)
Good luck Debbie!!!You're having your baby right now as I type!!
Good luck Debbie!!  You know I am thinking about you as always, and will anxiously awaiting that phone call!!!  I cannot wait to hear all about Gavin's arrival in this world!  Love ya girl!!!!

good luck to you all...i will be going in for a scheduled c-section either May 28th or June 1....it will be the 4th and last c-section as i am getting tubes tied at the same time.looking forward to seeing pics of these beautiful new bundles that are coming into your life.
Good luck Debbie!!!! When you were asking on the 24th, I thought you might have your little one already!!!! Maybe you will have the New Year's baby!!! Everything will be great!!!
Here's to a fast delivery and recovery : )

question: Hopefully by sometime tomorrow I will be bringing my son into this world.  I will be getting induced at 7:00 a.m. and who knows how long it will take for him to make his appreance.  I'm nervous, because I really didn't want to be induced, but with the GD my doctor said it would be best, they didn't want him to get too big.  Watch he will come out weighting 6 pounds, I did control my diabetes throughout my pregnancy though.  I will post pictures as soon as I can and Amanda I will call you when I start to make my rounds of telephone calls.Take Care All,Hugs - Debbie
title: Wish me luck ladies....
